fields.description:
{html}

Hi,
I want to add the CoreMedia framework in my application. To do that, I opened the project in / Library / Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.4.2/iphone/iphone/Titanium.xcodeproj.
First, in the list of frameworks, all is red (ie not found)... Nevermind, i add CoreMedia. After that, I come back on Titanium Developer, edit and save in the Edit tab, then Run on device.
My app works on my iPhone (iOS 4) but not in my iPods (3.1 and 3.1.2). It crashes just after loading the image Default.
How to fix this?
Thanks!

{html}
fields.summary: Application crashes after adding a framework (>= 3.1 and <= 4)
